((OOC: I apologize. I sent this out this morning, and totally ommited a poi=
nt Legacy was suppose to make, and this will require a slight rewrite of my=
 earlier post. It was suppose to go in line with my next pose with Cyclonus=
. So please consider this a correction. Again I am sorry for any confusion.=
 It's what I get for trying to post before I go to work.))
 
IC:
&nbsp=
;
> ::Lord Elder::
> 
> Elder: Can you tell us what these reprecus=
sions are or 
> must we protect the time space continuem that far?
&nbsp=
;
Legacy shook his head very slightly, =93DEFEATING THE MINIONS AT THIS JUN=
CTURE HAS AVERTED THE CRITICAL TIME SPACE EVENT, HOWEVER THERE STILL REMAIN=
S A SECONDARY EVENT. AT THE SUCCESSFUL COMPLETION OF THE ATTACK ON THE=
 ARK, CYCLONUS AND HIS MINIONS ATTACKED THE BASE OF THE PREDICON KNOWN=
 AS HYDRAS. WITHOUT THE MATRIX OF LEADERSHIP ON THE SIDE OF THE MAXIMALS OR=
 THE AUTOBOTS NONE OF THE COMBATABTS WERE ABLE TO STOP HIM. I DO =
NOT KNOW IF THIS VICTORY AT THE ARK WILL HAVE ANY EFFECT ON THE ULTIMATE OU=
TCOME."
 
It looked as if Legacy had more to say, but something trippe=
d his sensors . . . 
 
((OOC: I have taken out the rest of that last a=
borted post. Will add it later))
 
> Elder then notices how Legacy =
is distracted several times.
>  
> Elder: What is it?
 
Leg=
acy=92s optic brightens as he believes he has located the source of the sen=
sor blip, =93THERE IS SOMETHING ELSE HERE . . .=94 Legacy raised his right =
arm, and pointed in the direction of Nightstrike=92s hidden location. 
&nbs=
p;
Preston
(Legacy)
